entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sept-Îles
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:59 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.4°C

Condition: Mostly Cloudy

Visibility: 48.3 km

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
